geojson.title: Result geojson with column 'idiso' for the results in dB categories
geojson.description: Noise levels are divided into 8 categories. Specified in the 'idiso' property.                            EU treshold for 'relevant' noise is 55db                             < 45 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=0                             45 <> 50 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=1                             50 <> 55 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=2                             55 <> 60 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=3                             60 <> 65 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=4                             65 <> 70 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=5                             70 <> 75 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=6                             '>' 75 dB(A) ’ WHERE IDISO=7
